name: Magnetic Romance
description:
Magnetic Romance

This game was made as a contribution to Diving Squad Community Jam, topic "Connection is important". You take the role of a red magnet on his way to find his beloved second half on a small island maps. You can move yourself to object with blue M on them, or move object with red M to you! But beware, you can only use your magnetic powers 5 times before you turn into ashes. You also have to get as much matrixes as possible for your love to get the max amount of hearts. This is really small casual puzzle game, great for short gaming session. Enjoy!
